import React from 'react' import { ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import CourseItem from '../../components/Courses/CourseItem/CourseItem' import LogoFlutter from '../../assets/images/LogoFlutter.svg' import AvatarMeng from '../../assets/images/AvatarMeng.svg' import background1 from '../../assets/images/background1.svg' import background12 from '../../assets/images/background12.svg' import background8 from '../../assets/images/background8.svg' import background9 from '../../assets/images/background9.svg' import background10 from '../../assets/images/background10.svg' import background11 from '../../assets/images/background11.svg' import styles from './Courses.module.scss' const numbers = [ { id: 1, title: 'React Native for Designer', description: '16 videos - 3.5 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background8, }, { id: 2, title: 'Build a full site in Webflow', description: '12 videos - 4 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background9, }, { id: 3, title: 'Motion Design in After Effects', description: '10 videos - 1 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background10, }, { id: 4, title: 'Swift Advanced', description: '2 videos - 1 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background11, }, { id: 5, title: 'Learn Sketch', description: '2 videos - 1 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background12, }, { id: 6, title: 'Learn Swift', description: '27 videos - 4 hours', logo: LogoFlutter, avatar: AvatarMeng, background: background1, }, ] const Courses = () => { const listItems = numbers.map((item) => ) return (
{ }} to="/courses/" >
